title: The political journalism that matters most will be built from the ground up
description: Democracy only works if it can still surprise us, and journalism has to rediscover its capacity for surprise too. In 2026, my prediction (and hope) is that the outlets that matter most to democracy move away from reflexive “gotcha” coverage of politicians and toward a practice that centers voters’ lived experience, allows idealism back into...
